reviews.text: Amazing authentic Indian food. This is a cloud kitchen that's doing it right. Bombay has a large extensive menu of Indian offerings.  From samosas to...
Had a wonderful lunch ordering at this test kitchen today! All of the food was delicious. I really enjoyed tikka chicken rice and naan. The paneer kebabs...
Really like the concept of this place but I ordered sev puri and pau bhaji and the potato mix that came with the sev puri were stale and I just couldn't eat...
